<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns the Use edge that corresponds to \\p OpIdx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note: This is the default implementation that works for instructions that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// match the underlying LLVM instruction. All others should use a different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// implementation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/use">Use</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#a8014de6610ee432b675e3819e011acb2">getOperandUseDefault</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpIdx, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcctrloopsverify-cpp/#a345bd69760b9ee32b3f49d4fc04120fb">Verify</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns the Use for the \\p OpIdx&#39;th operand. This is virtual to allow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions to deviate from the LLVM IR operands, which is a requirement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for sandboxir Instructions that consist of more than one LLVM Instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#aa469c4f23b78900ac9135b3417819f31"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a7b479862be57f4448b155a225b5972ac">Use</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#aa469c4f23b78900ac9135b3417819f31">getOperandUseInternal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpIdx, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcctrloopsverify-cpp/#a345bd69760b9ee32b3f49d4fc04120fb">Verify</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#a1a834efd0135e81675280d5ba828d263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#a1a834efd0135e81675280d5ba828d263">OperandUseIterator</a>; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for getOperandUseInternal()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The default implementation works only for single-LLVMIR-instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Users and only if they match exactly the LLVM instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#a2a0e1f0647903c551dc3ea6333ab6fc3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#a2a0e1f0647903c551dc3ea6333ab6fc3">getUseOperandNoDefault</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a7b479862be57f4448b155a225b5972ac">Use</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a7b479862be57f4448b155a225b5972ac">Use</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a7b479862be57f4448b155a225b5972ac">Use</a>.LLVMUse-&gt;getOperandNo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
